channel.title: Changing around player ranks [PI]
channel.description:
I want my server to have: [code]playerRights = 0; = Banned. playerRights = 1; = Player. playerRights = 2; = Donor. playerRights = 3; = Super Donor. playerRights = 4; = Extreme Donor. playerRights = 5; = Veteran. playerRights = 6; = Mod. playerRights = 7; = Admin. playerRights = 8; = Owner.[/code] Then, I would like help with all of the commands to be set correctly. Then commands to make players each of these.
Currently I have: [code]pR = 0; = player pR = 1; = mod pR = 2; = admin pR = 3; = owner pR = 4; = donor pR = 5; = ? pR = 6; = ? pR = 7; = ?[/code]

item.title: Changing around player ranks [PI]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Locked as you’re still offering payment.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing around player ranks [PI]
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“runescape sucks, post:5, topic:459209”][quote author=No Faith link=topic=562113.msg4099249#msg4099249 date=1347238348]

RS2LoginProtocolDecoder - Anyone with player rights of 0, send a return code of 20 or whatever the banned return code is. Set the default value of your player rights to 1 in your player saving class (you could skip this step if you switched around the ‘banned’ with the ‘player’ player rights). The rest is really just commands… The images shown are loaded from the client. Add more images to your client using @cr and modicons (hint: search those and add more).

I’d rather be a nerdy rich kid and just pay somebody.
[/quote]

Fixed it.

Do what he said, it’s not that hard to read instructions that aren’t spoonfed to you.[/quote]Fuck no you didn’t fix shit. I am not spoiled in any way, fashion or form… I earn all of my money.
And of course $10 isn’t alot Mr. Mod. but it’s all I am going to pay for something this basic. I just don’t want to deal with it. Although my offer still stands to anybody interested. email me at PD_PvP@yahoo.com. 10$ for this.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing around player ranks [PI]
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

$10 = rich kid? Haha…

I removed the part regarding payment for the reasons stated above.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing around player ranks [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

All help is free on this forum - you just have to be willing to let people help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing around player ranks [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Offering rewards, especially money is not allowed on these forums. Please read the rules next time before posting offering rewards.

Read full topic

Set the default value of your player rights to 1 in your player saving class (you could skip this step if you switched around the ‘banned’ with the ‘player’ player rights). The rest is really just commands… The images shown are loaded from the client. Add more images to your client using @cr and modicons (hint: search those and add more).

item.title: Changing around player ranks [PI]
item.dc:creator: @No_Faith No Faith
item.description:
@No_Faith wrote:

[quote=“Fridder, post:2, topic:459209”]RS2LoginProtocolDecoder - Anyone with player rights of 0, send a return code of 20 or whatever the banned return code is. Set the default value of your player rights to 1 in your player saving class (you could skip this step if you switched around the ‘banned’ with the ‘player’ player rights). The rest is really just commands… The images shown are loaded from the client. Add more images to your client using @cr and modicons (hint: search those and add more).[/quote]Nope I am goooood, I just got my moms permission to use her PayPal, I already gave her the $10 that will be used to pay whoever helps. So, if you think you know how, PM me and I will give you my TeamViewer Details.
P.S. I didn’t want to waste time reading that hahah. ^.^
I’d rather be a nerdy rich kid and just pay somebody.

Read full topic

item.title: Changing around player ranks [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW

Add more images to your client using @cr and modicons (hint: search those and add more).[/quote]Hes offering money for someone to do it for him. Doubt he understood any of that.

This is simple. Do what fridder said, plus what I said in your other thread.

Read full topic
